system.description:
This spell instantly teleports you and everything you're carrying to any desired destination within range, which can either be a visualized location or a specified distance and direction. You may also bring along up to one additional willing creature per caster rank, although all of the creatures must be in contact with you (either directly or through each other). If a destination is occupied by a solid body, the teleporting creature is automatically Shaken

and transported to a random unoccupied location within range.
system.rank: Seasoned (Mage, Nightblade, Spellsinger and Wayfare Sphere)
